00020 #ifndef HYPERTABLE_THRIFT_CLIENT_H
00021 #define HYPERTABLE_THRIFT_CLIENT_H
00022 
00023 // Note: do NOT add any hypertable dependencies in this file
00024 #include <protocol/TBinaryProtocol.h>
00025 #include <transport/TSocket.h>
00026 #include <transport/TTransportUtils.h>
00027 
00028 #include "gen-cpp/HqlService.h"
00029 
00030 namespace Hypertable { namespace Thrift {
00031 
00032 using namespace apache::thrift;
00033 using namespace apache::thrift::protocol;
00034 using namespace apache::thrift::transport;
00035 
00036 // helper to initialize base class of Client
00037 struct ClientHelper {
00038   boost::shared_ptr<TSocket> socket;
00039   boost::shared_ptr<TTransport> transport;
00040   boost::shared_ptr<TProtocol> protocol;
00041 
00042   ClientHelper(const std::string &host, int port, int timeout_ms)
00043     : socket(new TSocket(host, port)),
00044       transport(new TFramedTransport(socket)),
00045       protocol(new TBinaryProtocol(transport)) {
00046 
00047     socket->setConnTimeout(timeout_ms);
00048     socket->setSendTimeout(timeout_ms);
00049     socket->setRecvTimeout(timeout_ms);
00050   }
00051 };
00052 
00056 class Client : private ClientHelper, public ThriftGen::HqlServiceClient {
00057 public:
00058   Client(const std::string &host, int port, int timeout_ms = 30000,
00059          bool open = true)
00060     : ClientHelper(host, port, timeout_ms), HqlServiceClient(protocol),
00061       m_do_close(false) {
00062 
00063     if (open) {
00064       transport->open();
00065       m_do_close = true;
00066     }
00067   }
00068 
00069   virtual ~Client() {
00070     if (m_do_close) {
00071       transport->close();
00072       m_do_close = false;
00073     }
00074   }
00075 
00076 private:
00077   bool m_do_close;
00078 };
00079 
00080 }} // namespace Hypertable::Thrift
00081 
00082 #endif /* HYPERTABLE_THRIFT_CLIENT_H */
